title: Necklace Box, ca. 1880
medium: Necklace: onyx and gold; box: blue velvet.
creditline: Gift of the estate and in memory of Robert B. Noyes
description: B: a box of blue velvet designed to hold the necklace.  On the undeside of the cover in gold letters : "Tiffany and Co. New York Ave de l'opera 36 bis Paris" and on the cover of the box is the monogram: "PDO" in silver letters.

tombstone.epitaph:
Necklace Box, ca. 1880.
ca. 1880. Necklace: onyx and gold; box: blue velvet.. Gift of the estate and in memory of Robert B. Noyes. 1946-50-78-b.
